prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (rugged handsome Asian man:1.2), muscular physique, messy black hair, (distinctive facial scars:1.3), intense gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (indented scar tissue:1.3), (stubble and sweat:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching martial arts gi fabric:1.2), sharp focus, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, blurry face, friendly smile, helmet hair, baby face
